name: Adventuremaker
tagline: This program creates a world and simulates it's history. You create a character that is put in a certain age of this world, and it's life is simulated(as a RPG, you choose his class,race,name etc).
body:
# Adventure Maker

This program creates a world and simulates it's history. You create a character that is put in a certain age of this world, and it's life is simulated(as a RPG, you choose his class,race,name etc).

***
Este programa cria um mundo e simula sua história. Você cria um personagem que é colocado em uma certa idade deste mundo, e que a vida é simulada (como um RPG, você escolhe sua classe, raça, nome, etc.)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
